The book is available as a data package in R.
The package includes the text, figured, tables, table of contents, and entity annotations of the text.

Installation instructions:


```
devtools::install_github("STAT325-S24/HistoryAmherstCollege")
library(HistoryAmherstCollege)
```

Location of data package and source files: [https://https://github.com/STAT325-S24/HistoryAmherstCollege](https://https://github.com/STAT325-S24/HistoryAmherstCollege)
